visualization_prompt: Generate a bar chart showing the ranking of EU countries by organic farming area percentage using categorical comparison with labeled data points

title.text: Top 10 EU countries in organic farming area (2018)

visualization_explanation: First paragraph: This dataset contains 10 categorical entries (EU countries) with one quantitative variable (organic farming area percentage). The data comes directly from Eurostat, the official EU statistical office, ensuring high reliability and methodological consistency. Values represent the percentage of total agricultural land under organic farming in 2018, maintaining perfect proportional comparability through standardized measurement. Second paragraph: The horizontal bar chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating gridlines and legend while retaining clear percentage labels. Vertical orientation leverages Cairo's length perception principle for accurate magnitude comparisons. Color choice (#a5d6a7) provides adequate contrast while maintaining thematic relevance to agriculture. The 0-30% axis range with 10% intervals creates meaningful benchmarks without over-segmentation. Data labels (+24.1% for Austria) enable precise value reading while maintaining clean negative space.
